title: Deploying a highly available SAP environment using IBM Db2 on IBM VPC
introduction: This deployment guide provides resources to help deploying a highly available SAP system using Db2 as an underlying database in an IBM Cloud Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) environment.

section_highlights.title: Db2 Optimization Techniques for SAP Database Migration to the Cloud
section_highlights.description: This IBM Redbook provides in-depth recommendations for the source system database export.
